sentences.en: 512k RAM is recommended and 640k RAM is preferred.
sentences.cn: 推荐配置为512K内存，640K内存则更佳。

sentences.en: A shop in Station Road was the target of a ram-raid early yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天清晨车站路的一家商店遭到了飞车抢劫。

sentences.en: Dynamic RAM's need to be refreshed periodically.
sentences.cn: 动态RAM则需要周期性地刷新数据.

sentences.en: In the latest raid, thieves used his van to ram a police car.
sentences.cn: 在最近一宗劫案中，窃贼开着他的小型货车猛撞一辆警车。

sentences.en: It took me ten minutes to ram the idea into his head.
sentences.cn: 我同他磨了十分钟嘴皮,才使他明白.

sentences.en: Or I'll take my fist and ram it down your sassy throat!
sentences.cn: 再说我就动拳头让你尝尝我的厉害!

sentences.en: Railway lines are dangerous places and it is up to parents to ram home the dangers to their children.
sentences.cn: 铁路是危险的地方，父母有责任让孩子们清楚地认识到这一点。

sentences.en: Ram-raiders smashed their way into a high-class store.
sentences.cn: 驾车抢劫者开车冲进了一家高档商店。

sentences.en: The catalyst is subjected to a uniform ram pressure.
sentences.cn: 催化剂承受均匀活塞压力.

sentences.en: The kids who are joyriding and ram-raiding are unemployed.
sentences.cn: 那些开偷来的车狂飙和驾车抢劫的年轻人都是无业游民。

sentences.en: The system has 256 MB RAM, expandable to 2GB.
sentences.cn: 这个系统内存 256 兆字节，可扩充到 2 千兆字节。

sentences.en: Then Abraham looked up, and he saw a ram.
sentences.cn: 亚伯拉罕昂起头, 看见一只公羊.

sentences.en: They used a lorry to ram the main gate.
Took me ten minutes to ram the idea into his head.
sentences.cn: 我同他磨了十分钟的嘴皮,才使他明白.

phrases.tran_cn: 冲压空气；冲击气；柱塞式进气系统
abbr. 静态随机存取存储器（Static Random Access Memory）

trans.tran_cn: 随机存取存储器（random access memory的缩写）；随机访问内存（random-access memory的缩写）
公羊，<天>(R-)白羊（星）座，<机>夯，攻城槌
撞击；填塞；强迫通过或接受
trans.tran_en: to run or drive into something very hard

trans.tran_cn: （使）猛烈撞击，迅速移动，迫使…明白
夯实（土等），猛撞，猛压，反复灌输
